description: The intruder sneaked into a home while the family slept and stole an 11-year-old girl's savings.
title: Isle of Man burglar who stole girl's money jar is jailed
title_page: Isle of Man burglar who stole girl's money jar is jailed - BBC News
maintext: His father also saw the light in the girl's bedroom was on, but she was not at home at the time.
